payload: in need the feature to set gemini api base url to tunnel traffic to litellm

Added GEMINI_API_BASE_URL env var support. When set, all GoogleGenAI client instances (gemini-parse, categorize, API questions routes) pass httpOptions.baseUrl to route traffic through LiteLLM or any custom proxy. Build/lint/test/typecheck all pass.
